title: New: Tora – These Eyes
body:
Australia yet again.

**Tora** are no strangers to the pages of CitR, having reared their heads in [September](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/24216-introducing-tora/) of last year, they’ve consistently been putting out top quality material. New track _These Eyes_ dropped shortly before SXSW craziness kicked in, so we’re just catching up now, and they just keep getting better. Vocally, it’s stronger than anything they’ve released in the past, and is hopefully a sign of an album on the horizon. Stream These Eyes below.
